imdb.plot outline: "Hermes and Renato" is one of the boldest comedy group in Brazilian television. They entertained generations with skits that do not spare anyone or anything: the world of arts, sports, politics and, of course, the television itself. Their irreverent sense of humor of this comedians comes back in a new season, presenting a variety of current topics : the reality television shows, pop music, sensationalist journalism, the MMA Championships, the World Cup in Brazil.
imdb.title: Hermes e Renato
plot: "Hermes and Renato" is one of the boldest comedy group in Brazilian television. They entertained generations with skits that do not spare anyone or anything: the world of arts, sports, politics and, of course, the television itself. Their irreverent sense of humor of this comedians comes back in a new season, presenting a variety of current topics : the reality television shows, pop music, sensationalist journalism, the MMA Championships, the World Cup in Brazil.::Boutique Filmes
